name: 黄海之殇(Broken Heart in Naval Battle of the Yellow Sea)
name_original: 黄海之殇(Broken Heart in Naval Battle of the Yellow Sea)
description:
你将扮演北洋水师提督经营水师,在一年后的黄海海战与日本联合舰队进行国运之战。游戏背景为1894中日甲午战争,你作为提督丁汝昌 的副官 打理舰队的日常建设,在紧凑的军费和政治影响力下，提升水师官兵的技能、训练水平和士气，改进老化的舰船装备，管理各位管带的人事任命和培养。通过种种手段来赢得这场大海战，再造华夏。游戏较为紧凑,一周目通关较难,请注意舰队的士气。

You will play the role of commander in chief of Beiyang Navy and manage the Navy. One year later, you will fight against the Japanese United Fleet in the Yellow Sea battle. The background of the game is the Sino Japanese War in 1894. As an adjutant of governor Ding Ruchang, you take care of the daily construction of the fleet. Under the tight military expenditure and political influence, you can improve the skills, training level and morale of the Navy officers and soldiers, improve the aging ship equipment, and manage the personnel appointment and training of each leader. Through various means to win the great naval battle and rebuild China in 1894. The game is more compact, it is difficult to win in your first try. Please pay attention to the morale of the fleet.
